data.title: Kairana , उत्तर प्रदेश
data.text:
Kairana is a village panchayat located in the Muzaffarnagar district of Uttar-Pradesh state,India. The latitude 29.4 and longitude 77.2 are the geocoordinate of the Kairana. . The other nearest state capital from Kairana is Delhi and its distance is 81.3 KM. The other surrouning state capitals are Delhi 81.3 KM., Dehradun 119.5 KM., Chandigarh 155.5 KM., Chandigarh 155.5 KM.,

The surrounding nearby villages and its distance from Kairana are Kairana Rural 10.5 KM , Mohammadpur Rai 25.2 KM , Naglarai , Badhu Pura , Ramra , Allipur , Mawi , Unchagaon , Shekhupura , Jahanpura , Mandawar , .

The official language of Kairana

The native language of Kairana is Hindi, Urdu and most of the village people speak Hindi, Urdu. Kairana people use Hindi, Urdu language for communication.

Kairana Sun rise time

Kairana village is located in the UTC 5.30 time zone and it follows indian standard time(IST). Kairana sun rise time varies 21 minutes from IST. The vehicle driving side in Kairana is left, all vehicles should take left side during driving. Kairana people are using its national currency which is Indian Rupee and its internationl currency code is INR. Kairana phones and mobiles can be accesed by adding the indian country dialing code +91 from abroad. Kairana people are following the dd/mm/yyyy date format in day-to-day life. Kairana domain name extension( cTLD) is .in .

The nearest railway station in and around Kairana

The nearest railway station to Kairana is Khandrawali which is located in and around 9.3 kilometer distance. The following table shows other railway stations and its distance from Mamakudi.

Khandrawali railway station9.3 KM.Balwa railway station9.9 KM.Gujran Balwa railway station9.9 KM.Kandhla railway station12.3 KM.Shamli railway station12.3 KM.

Nearest airport to Kairana

Kairana‘s nearest airport is Karnal Airport situated at 38.3 KM distance. Few more airports around Kairana are as follows.

Karnal Airport38.3 KM.Sarsawa Air Base68.6 KM.Meerut Airport71.4 KM.

Nearest districts to Kairana

Kairana is located around 26.8 kilometer away from its district head quarter muzaffarnagar. The other nearest district head quarters is saharanpur situated at 20.2 KM distance from Kairana . Surrounding districts from Kairana are as follows.

Saharanpur ( saharanpur ) district20.2 KM.Panipat ( panipat ) district23.3 KM.Fatehpur ( fatehpur ) district38.7 KM.Karnal ( karnal ) district39.2 KM.

Nearest town/city to Kairana

Kairana‘s nearest town/city/important place is Kairana located at the distance of 0.8 kilometer. Surrounding town/city/TP/CT from Kairana are as follows.

Kairana0.8 KM.Ghazipur9.8 KM.Kandhla11.0 KM.Shamli12.0 KM.Jhinjhana13.8 KM.

Schools in and around Kairana

Kairana nearest schools has been listed as follows.

Zakir Memorial High School0.3 KM.S D Public School Kairana0.3 KM.Gold Keys Public School2.4 KM.School Vky3.0 KM.Girls School3.1 KM.

Beaches in and around Kairana

Kairana‘s nearest beach is Ennore Beach located at the distance of 1827.0 kilometers. Surrounding beaches from Kairana are as follows.

Ennore Beach1827.0 KM.Thiruvottiyur Beach1833.0 KM.Marina Beach1845.6 KM.Santhome Beach1848.8 KM.Elliots Beach1851.0 KM.
